titleStmt.title: Sr. Kenelme Digbyes honour maintained by a most couragious combat which he fought with the Lord Mount le Ros, who by bale and slanderous words reviled our king : also the true relation how he went to the King of France who
titleStmt.author: Digby, Kenelm, Sir, 1603-1665.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Kenelm Digby. Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
